data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the county of Las Palmas.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Las Palmas, Islas Canarias, Spain
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the county of Las Palmas.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.section_summary: On average, 109 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Las Palmas, Islas Canarias, Spain.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Over 22.69 percent of the people of Las Palmas are far from Jesus.
Jesus, remind the disciples in the county of Las Palmas to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of San Bartolomé de Tirajana
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of San Bartolomé de Tirajana, Islas Canarias, Spain.
Father, for those in trouble in the county of Las Palmas prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Las Palmas, Islas Canarias, Spain to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Please, teach the 17,349 believers in Las Palmas, Islas Canarias, Spain how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.
